properties.areaDesc: Washington, GA; Baldwin, GA; Wilkinson, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 5:12AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
Oconee River near Milledgeville affecting Baldwin...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Washington and Wilkinson
Counties

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Johnson...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties

Oconee River near Mount Vernon affecting Montgomery...Treutlen and
Wheeler Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Oconee River near Milledgeville.
* From this afternoon until further notice.
* At 4 AM Thursday the stage was 21.9 feet and falling.
* Minor flooding is forecast to occur again.
* Flood stage is 22 feet.
* Forecast to once again rise above flood stage by Thursday afternoon
and continue to rise to near 24.3 feet by after midnight Friday.
* At 24 feet, minor flooding continues upstream and downstream
from the gage located around one half mile upstream from the
Georgia Highway 22 and 24 bridge. The parking lot and portions of
the Oconee River Greenway Park just downstream from the bridge will
be flooded. Low lying areas of woodlands and pasture near the river
will be flooded one to two feet deep. Sinclair Dam will likely have
two gates open to reach this height.
